description.en:
The "bittersweet, mysterious story" revolves around Chocolat Aikawa, a chocolatière who runs a shop called Chocolat Noir. She can grant wishes to the troubled people who visit her shop — if they give her something precious in exchange.

In the [i]Chocolat no Mahou[/i] (The Magic of Chocolate) series:

V.01 - [i]Chocolat no Mahou[/i]
V.02 - [i]Bittersweet[/i]
V.03 - [i]Creamy Sugar[/i]
V.04 - [i]Dark Spice[/i]
V.05 - [i]Evil Essence[/i]
V.06 - [i]Fruity Flavor[/i]
V.07 - [i]Guilty Crunch[/i]
V.08 - [i]Honey Blood[/i]
V.09 - [i]Ice Shadow[/i]
V.10 - [i]Jewel Syrup[/i]
V.11 - [i]Knocking Egg[/i]
V.12 - [i]Love Flake[/i]
V.13 - [i]Melty Night[/i]
V.14 - [i]Nutty Carnival[/i]
V.15 - [i]Odd Cake[/i]
V.16 - [i]Phantom Decoration[/i]
V.17 - [i]Queen Candy[/i]

[*] Doraje Koibitotachi no Kiseki

[url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12566]See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.[/url]
